p: The antioxidant activity was screened by evaluation of the DPPH radical scavenging ability [ 23]. Briefly, 10 μL of each plant extract (10 mg/mL) were mixed with 990 μL of DPPH solution (0.002% in ethanol). After 30 min incubation at room temperature, absorbance was measured at 517 nm against a corresponding blank. The antioxidant activity (AA, %) was calculated as: AA (%) = ( A DPPH − A sample)/ A DPPH, (1) where A DPPH is the absorbance of DPPH solution (in the absence of sample extract) and A sample is the absorption of sample solution. Assays were carried out in triplicate and ascorbic acid was used as positive control.
